summary: Waste encompasses various aspects of modern society, from economic systems to educational practices. It explores the concept of excess in capitalism, critiques decentralization in blockchain, and examines how art challenges conventional notions of nature and culture. The theme also delves into satirical approaches to education, highlighting counterproductive practices that waste time and resources. This multifaceted topic encourages critical thinking about consumption, sustainability, and the value we assign to materials and information in our daily lives.
excerpt: The article explores decentralization, excess, and waste in modern society. It critiques blockchain and cryptocurrency, examines scarcity and abundance in capitalism, and discusses how art challenges conventional notions of nature, culture, and waste.
